(Simplified: 镤)
Chinese Definition:
①一種放射性金屬元素，爲最穩定的同位素。
②古代稱未經煉製的銅鐵。

鏷字的基本解释

鏷
pú
见“镤”。

鏷字的汉语字典释义

[①]［pú］
［《廣韻》蒲沃切，入沃，並。］
“镤1”的繁体字。
(1)未经炼制的铜铁。
(2)放射性元素。符号Pa。灰白色，有光泽，最稳定的同位素半衰期约三万二千年。

鏷字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　鏷； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页1321第13
【廣韻】【集韻】?蒲沃切，音僕。【玉篇】鏷?，矢名。◎按本作僕。見左傳莊十年。　又【張協·七命】鏷越鍛成。【註】鏷，生鐵也。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［pú］
["Guangyun" Pu Woqie, enter Wo, merge. ]
Traditional characters for "镤1".
(1) Unrefined copper and iron.
(2) Radioactive elements. Symbol Pa. It is off-white, shiny, and the most stable isotope has a half-life of about 32,000.
鏷
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Xu Ji 1] [Golden Word Department] 　鏷; Kangxi Strokes: 20; Page Number: Page 1321 and 13
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Pu Woqie, sound servant. [Jade articles] 鏷?, the name of the arrow. ◎According to this as a servant. See Zuo Chuanzhuang ten years.　[Zhang Xie·Seven Lives] The more forged. [Note] 鏷, pig iron also.
